subject: Football
lead_paragraph: This long-running Jets-Patriots rivalry is as real as Bill Belichick’s resentment and as firm as the Eric Mangini handshake will be Sunday, when he has so much to win and so little, really, to lose.
snippet: This long-running Jets-Patriots rivalry is as real as Bill Belichick’s resentment and as firm as the Eric Mangini handshake will be Sunday, when he has so much to win and so little, really, to lose.
